snippet: Olbermann, who returned to ESPN two years ago to host a late-night show on ESPN2 that was eventually shifted to the afternoon, will leave the network this month.
abstract: ESPN announces that commentator Keith Olbermann is leaving the network.
lead_paragraph: Olbermann, who returned to ESPN two years ago to host a late-night show on ESPN2 that was eventually shifted to the afternoon, will leave the network this month.

headline.main: Keith Olbermann and ESPN to Part Ways
